name: Lightsworn Owl
text: FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Lightsworn" monster from your GY. If a Lightsworn monster(s) is sent from the Deck to the GY while this card is face-down on the field: You can flip this card face-up. You can banish 2 other "Lightsworn'' monsters from your GY: Special Summon this card from your GY in face-down Defense position. You can only activate each effect of "Lightsworn Owl'' once per turn.
